Text: Thanks!! But wheeeere is the usual 1.1 GB version? I'm gonna need a bigger harddrive and a loooot of blank DVDR discs this season...

I don't know why everyone is saying 2 hours... it's 1 and 1/2 hour of show and if your watching it on tv, there's 1/2 hour of commercial, and that's why it would be considered a 2 hour show... But you're downloading it from here so it's just a 1 and 1/2 hour show.
